item.title: Updating the site
item.description: open cmd as admin and input one line at a time: d: cd D:\Mejinzs\Documents\DnD Worlds\Open Table npx quartz build npx quartz sync --build git push `.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome to my open table server. We will be playing with some slightly modified 5e D&D rules. Here are the basic rules for both the server in general as well as for playing with others.

item.title: Societas Magica Historica - Mage Scholars
item.description: A group of historians and magic users hoping to discover lost magics. They maintain libraries and research groups all over, but are particularly interested in the academy that has been recently opened.

item.title: Plousies Skies - Thieves Guild
item.description: Sometimes working under the pseudonym ‚ÄúPlush Skies‚Äù, the thieves guild helps connect thieves and burglars with each other and with fences. They have branches in most major cities and enforce an honor among thieves mindset.

item.title: Orcs
item.description: Pig like in appearance, orcs are often considered both stubborn and loyal. Orcs as a whole are distrustful of magic, believing it lead to the fall of their once great empire, of which there is now only oral tradition.

item.title: Humans
item.description: The most common, making up about 50% of the area. They come from diverse backgrounds and cultures. In the Ausfallen region humans, like many others, are trying to establish themselves.
